Hey everyone,

I have recently been looking into whether or not we can have heritrix run in
a distributed manner and had opened a minor issue for it. Gordon was kind
enough to point out the list here might be helpful. Also Noah was kind
enough to point to the hcc project which as I understand is in the alpha
stage. I was considering porting heritrixs to hadoop and would like the
opinions of the group. My line of thought was to change the worker threads
into map functions and then use reduce to manage the URLs. Arguably one does
not really need map/reduce for this and could go more with the approach of
the hcc project but honestly I am still going through heritrix code so, l
would love the input from people on this.

Thanks and best regards

Mackram Raydan

--90e6ba615066b27967049026a0e1
